chapters.title: Food: Where Does It Come From?
chapters.description: Understanding different sources of food, plant and animal products, and food habits.

chapters.title: Components of Food
chapters.description: Learning about nutrients, balanced diet, deficiency diseases, and food components.

chapters.title: Fibre to Fabric
chapters.description: Understanding natural and synthetic fibres, their sources, and the process of making fabric.

chapters.title: Sorting Materials into Groups
chapters.description: Properties of materials, classification based on properties, and uses of different materials.

chapters.title: Separation of Substances
chapters.description: Methods of separation, mixtures, solutions, and practical applications of separation techniques.
